Select the owner of the project resources.

Set the resources you want to automatically assign when a new task is created.
Allows the use of "Milestone", tasks that have zero as duration
Sets the project visibility for the involved resources.It can be llimited to the assigned tasks or complete.
Sets if a task is signed as completed when all of its resources set the completion to 100%, or if a verification by a manager is required.
Sets the automatic management of dates and time. It can be handled by the system or by the user himself.
Sets if estimated dates are allowed. For example, a task with duration "6?d" , is a task with 6 days estimated duration .
Sets if summary tasks are allowed. If you are using the CPM mode, it will not be possible to create dependencies from and towards summary tasks.
Select owner from the communities of mine
